message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable selling the product for $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1100000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not willing to go up to $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $950000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're trying to be reasonable, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable selling the product for $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1050000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to go up to $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $975000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
